results.name: a(n) = 4^(n-1) mod n.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to pseudoprimes
program: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b062175.txt", n, " ", 4^(n - 1)%n) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 02 2009
